GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
md: fix double free of io_acct_set bioset

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit f99d5b5dc8a42c807b5f1176b925aa45d61962ab, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 0c031fd37f69deb0cd8c43bbfcfccd62ebd7e952. For more details please see the references link.
